Caribbean.name: Caribana Festival
Caribbean.blurb: A vibrant celebration of Caribbean culture featuring a grand parade, music, and dance that attracts millions each year.

Caribbean.name: Toronto Caribbean Carnival
Caribbean.blurb: A month-long celebration of Caribbean culture with music, dance, and art, culminating in a vibrant parade showcasing colorful costumes.

Caribbean.name: Caribbean Arts and Culture Festival
Caribbean.blurb: A festival showcasing Caribbean arts through music, dance, and visual arts, highlighting the richness of Caribbean culture.

Caribbean.name: Reggae Fest
Caribbean.blurb: A music festival celebrating reggae music with live performances from renowned artists and local talent.

Chinese.name: Chinese New Year Parade
Chinese.blurb: A festive celebration marking the Lunar New Year with colorful parades, lion dances, and cultural performances in Toronto's Chinatown.

Chinese.name: Mid-Autumn Festival
Chinese.blurb: A celebration of the harvest moon featuring lantern displays, traditional foods, and cultural performances.

Chinese.name: Dragon Boat Festival
Chinese.blurb: An exciting dragon boat racing festival with cultural performances and food stalls celebrating Chinese heritage.

Chinese.name: Chinese Lantern Festival
Chinese.blurb: An enchanting festival featuring stunning lantern displays, traditional performances, and cultural activities.

Chinese.name: Chinese Food Festival
Chinese.blurb: A culinary celebration showcasing diverse Chinese cuisines with food stalls and cooking demonstrations.

Indian.name: Diwali Festival
Indian.blurb: A grand celebration of the Festival of Lights featuring cultural performances, food stalls, and fireworks to mark the triumph of light over darkness.

Indian.name: Festival of India
Indian.blurb: A vibrant celebration of Indian culture featuring performances, food, and art, highlighting the rich heritage of India.

Indian.name: Holi Festival
Indian.blurb: A colorful festival celebrating love and joy with music, dance, and the throwing of colored powders.

Indian.name: Maha Shivratri Festival
Indian.blurb: A Hindu festival celebrating Lord Shiva, featuring prayers, cultural performances, and community gatherings.

Indian.name: Punjabi Mela
Indian.blurb: A vibrant cultural festival showcasing Punjabi music, dance, and food to celebrate the rich heritage of Punjab.

Indigenous.name: Indigenous Peoples Day
Indigenous.blurb: A day to recognize and celebrate the rich culture and contributions of Indigenous peoples in Canada.

Indigenous.name: Toronto Indigenous Cultural Festival
Indigenous.blurb: A celebration of Indigenous culture through art, music, dance, and storytelling.

Indigenous.name: National Indigenous Peoples Day
Indigenous.blurb: A day to celebrate and honor the cultures and contributions of Indigenous peoples across Canada.

Indigenous.name: Anishinaabe Art Exhibit
Indigenous.blurb: An art exhibit showcasing the works of Anishinaabe artists, highlighting traditional and contemporary pieces.

Indigenous.name: Indigenous Fashion Week
Indigenous.blurb: A showcase of Indigenous fashion designers and artists, promoting Indigenous culture through fashion.

Filipino.name: Filipino Heritage Month Celebration
Filipino.blurb: A celebration of Filipino culture featuring music, dance, art, and traditional food to honor the contributions of Filipinos in Canada.

Filipino.name: Pahiyas Festival
Filipino.blurb: A vibrant festival showcasing Filipino culture with traditional food, crafts, and performances.

Filipino.name: Buwan ng Wika
Filipino.blurb: A celebration of Filipino language and culture with various activities promoting the richness of Filipino heritage.

Filipino.name: Filipino Food Festival
Filipino.blurb: A culinary festival showcasing traditional Filipino dishes, cooking demonstrations, and cultural performances.

Filipino.name: Kultura Festival
Filipino.blurb: A festival celebrating Filipino arts and culture through music, dance, and visual arts.

Taiwanese.name: Taiwanese Night Market
Taiwanese.blurb: A lively night market featuring traditional Taiwanese street food, games, and cultural performances.

Taiwanese.name: Taiwanese Cultural Festival
Taiwanese.blurb: A celebration of Taiwanese culture with food, music, and art exhibitions showcasing the beauty of Taiwan.

Taiwanese.name: Taiwan Lantern Festival
Taiwanese.blurb: An enchanting festival featuring beautiful lantern displays, traditional performances, and Taiwanese food.

Taiwanese.name: Taiwanese Film Festival
Taiwanese.blurb: Showcasing the best of Taiwanese cinema with screenings, discussions, and cultural presentations.

Taiwanese.name: Taiwanese Pop Music Night
Taiwanese.blurb: A night of live performances featuring popular Taiwanese music artists and cultural dance presentations.

Indonesian.name: Indonesian Cultural Festival
Indonesian.blurb: A celebration of Indonesian culture featuring traditional dances, music, and food stalls.

Indonesian.name: Bali Night
Indonesian.blurb: An evening showcasing Balinese culture with traditional performances, crafts, and authentic cuisine.

Indonesian.name: Indonesian Independence Day Celebration
Indonesian.blurb: A community gathering celebrating Indonesia's independence with cultural performances, food, and activities.

Indonesian.name: Jakarta Fair
Indonesian.blurb: A trade fair showcasing Indonesian products, culture, and entertainment, bringing the essence of Jakarta to Toronto.

Indonesian.name: Indonesian Film Festival
Indonesian.blurb: A festival dedicated to showcasing Indonesian films, including screenings, discussions, and cultural presentations.

Sri Lankan.name: Sri Lankan New Year Festival
Sri Lankan.blurb: A celebration of the Sinhala and Tamil New Year featuring traditional food, music, and cultural performances.

Sri Lankan.name: Sri Lankan Food Festival
Sri Lankan.blurb: A culinary event showcasing authentic Sri Lankan dishes, cooking demonstrations, and cultural activities.

Sri Lankan.name: Tamil Heritage Month Celebration
Sri Lankan.blurb: A month-long celebration featuring Tamil culture with music, dance, art exhibitions, and community events.
